WSUS02 KKCI 030016 
MIAQ WS 030016 
SIGMET QUEBEC 3 VALID UNTIL 030416 
SIGMET  
NC PA WV MD VA KY TN 
FROM 30ESE AIR TO EMI TO 30WSW GSO TO 40W HMV TO 30ESE AIR 
OCNL SEV TURB BLW 080. DUE TO STG LOW LVL WNDS AND STG UDDFS AND 
LLWS. CONDS CONTG BYD 0416Z.
